content: विप्रतिषेधः {@--1@} Keeping under control, controlling; क्रव्याद्भ्य इव भूतानामदांतेभ्यः सदा भयम् . तेषां विप्रतिषेधार्थं राजा सृष्टः स्वयंभुवा <ls>Mb.</ls> {@--2@} The opposition of two courses of action which are equally important, the conflict of two even-matched interests; हरिर्विप्रतिषेधं तमाच चक्षे विचक्षणः <ls>Śi. 2. 6</ls> (तुल्यबलविरोधो विप्रतिषेधः <ls>Malli.</ls>). {@--3@} (In <ab>gram.</ab>) The conflict of two different grammatical operations become possible according to two different rules, conflict of two equally important rules; विप्रतिषेधे परं कार्यं <ls>P. I. 4. 2</ls>; विरोधो विप्रतिषेधः . यत्र द्वौ प्रसंगावन्यार्थावेकस्मिन् प्राप्नुतः स विप्रतिषेधः <ls>Kāśikā.</ls>; See <ls>Mbh.</ls> also. {@--4@} Prohibition.
